gurmukhi: n qRsqM n gRsqM smsqM srUpy ]nmsqM nmsqM quAsqM ABUqy ]30]120]
transliteration: Na Trastan Na Grastan Samastan Daroope|| Namastan Namastan Tuastan Abhoote||30||120||
translation: Thou art Fearless, free from any bondage and Thou manifestest in all beings. I bow before Thee, I bow before Thee, O Wonderful Non-Elemental Lord.30.120.

gurmukhi: AbXkq qyj AnBau pRkws ]A`CY srUp AdÍY Anws ]
transliteration: Abyakt Tej Anbhau Prakaas|| Achchhai Saroopsaroopadvai Anaas||
translation: O Lord! Thou art Unmanifested Glory and Light of Knowledge. Thou art Unassailable Entity, Non-dual and Indestructible.

gurmukhi: Anqut qyj AnQut BMfwr ]dwqw durMq srbM pRkwr ]1]121]
transliteration: Antout Tej Anbhau Prakaas|| Achchhai Saroopadvai Anaas||
translation: Thou art indivisible Glory and an Inexhaustible Store. Thou art the Infinite Donor of all kinds. 1.121.

gurmukhi: AnBUq qyj AniC`j gwq ]krqw sdIv hrqw snwq ]
transliteration: Anbhoot Tej Anchhijj Gadt|| Kartaa Sadoov Hartaa Sanaat||
translation: Thine is the Wonderful Glory and Indestructible Body. Thou art ever the Creator and Remover of Meanness.

gurmukhi: Awsn Afol AnBUq krm ]dwqw dieAwl AnBUq Drm ]2]122]
transliteration: Aasan Adol Anbhoot Karam|| Daataa Daeaal Anbhoot Dharam||2||122||
translation: Thy Seat is Stable and Thy actions are non-elemental. Thou art the Beneficent Donor and Thy religious discipline is Beyond the working of elements. 2.122.

gurmukhi: ijh s`qR im`qR nih jnm jwq ]ijh puqR BRwq nhIN is`qR mwq ]
transliteration: Jih Sattra Mittra Nah(i) Janam Jaat|| Jih Poutra Bhraat Nahoon Mittra Maat||
translation: Thou art that Ultimate Reality which is without enemy, friend, birth and caste, which is without son, brother, friend and mother.

gurmukhi: ijh krm Brm nhIN Drm iDAwn ]ijh nyh gyh nhIN ibEq bwn ]3]123]
transliteration: Jih Karam Bharam Nahoon Dharam Dhiaan|| Jih Neh Geh Nahoon Biot Baan||3||123||
translation: Which is action less, Illusion less and without any consideration of religious disciplines; which is without love, home and beyond any thought-system. 3.123.

gurmukhi: ijh jwq pwq nhIN s`qR im`qR ]ijh nyh gyh nhIN ichn ic`qR ]
transliteration: Jih Jaat Paat Nahoon Sattra Mittra|| Jih Neh Geh Nahoon Chihan Chittra||
translation: Which is without caste, line, enemy and friend. Which is without love, home, mark and picture.

gurmukhi: ijh rMg rUp nhIN rwg ryK ]ijh jnm jwq nhIN Brm ByK ]4]124]
transliteration: Jih Ran Roop Nahoon Raag Rekh|| Jih Janam Jaat Nahoon Bharam Bhekh||4||124||
translation: Which is without caste, line, enemy and friend. Which is without is without birth, caste, illusion and guise. 4.124.

gurmukhi: ijh krm Brm nhI jwq pwq ]nhI nyh gyh nhI ip`qR mwq ]
transliteration: Jih Karam Bharam Nahoo Jaat Paat|| Nahoo Neh Geh Nahoo Pittra Maat||
translation: Which is without action, delusion, caste and lineage. Which is without love, home, father and mother.

gurmukhi: ijh nwm Qwm nhI brg ibAwD ]ijh rog sog nhI sqR swD ]5]125]
transliteration: Jih Naam Thaam Nahoo Barag Biaadh|| Jih Rog Sog Nahoo Satra Saadh||5||125||
translation: Which is without name, place, and also without species of maladies; which is without ailment, sorrow, enemy and a saintly friend. 5.125.

gurmukhi: ijh qRws vws nhI dyh nws ]ijh Awid AMq nhI rUp rws ]
transliteration: Jih Traas Vaas Nahoo Deh Naas|| Jih Aadh Ant Nahoo Roop Raas||
translation: Which never remains in fear and whose body is Indestructible; which has no beginning, no end, no form and no outlay.

gurmukhi: ijh rog sog nhI jog jugiq ]ijh qRws Aws nhI BUim Bugiq ]6]126]
transliteration: Jih Rog Sog Nahoo Jog Jougad(i)|| Jih Traas Aas Nahoo Bhoom(i) Bhougad(i)||6||126||
translation: Which has no ailment, sorrow and no device of Yoga; which has no fear, no hope, and no earthly enjoyment. 6.126.
